short_summary: Co-publication of a high-quality book on the history of aircrafts for the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) with a special edition book box.

full_summary:
Tender Announcement: Co-publication of Book on Royal Canadian Air Force History
==============================

### Title and Reference Information

*   Title: Co-publication of book for the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF)
*   Reference Number: WS4062296973-Doc4087361272
*   Solicitation Number: WS4062296973

### Tender Status and Further Details

This tender was initially posted on 06 July 2023, with a closure date of 14 August 2023.   However, in accordance with Section XX XX Procurement Regulations, this tender has now been cancelled.

### Contract Details

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Region of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Procurement Method and Type

This opportunity is a Competitive Call for Selective Tendering with the primary selection criterion being the **Lowest Price**. Tenderers must ensure they respond to the project-specific requirements.

### Book Description

We are looking for a company to collaborate with us on the co-publication of a book detailing the history of aircrafts for the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), complete with a special edition book box. The proposed production should meet the expected standards for the end-user.

### Contact Information

If you have any queries or questions related to this announcement, please [contact Andrea Keyserlingk](mailto:andrea.keyserlingk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) from the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

---

Please ensure any revisions aim to provide a clean and clear view of the government tender announcement: an informative report that presents details of the RCAF book co-publication tender, procurement information, and contact details. Focus on making it concise and easy to read. 

- Things to keep in mind:
-   Keep the listed information in a clear format to ensure it is easy to read.
-     Ensure all the formatting meets the required standards and, where possible, aligns with existing documents so that there are no inconsistencies
-    If any information is deemed sensitive, carefully handle these items and work closely with the concerned departments to get approvals before publishing. 
-  Ensure there's no damage to any form of communication. Omits or excludes nothing that could show any bias towards the decision made on this call to tenders. 

   Ensure the parameters of this requirement have maintained confidentiality with regards to dealing wiht sensitive documents.
